package main

import (
	"github.com/ToQoz/gopwt/assert"
	"testing"
)

func TestSimple(t *testing.T) {
	func() {
		translatedassert.
			OK(t, 1 == 1, []string{"1 is 1"}, `FAIL`, `./testdata/rewrite_file_tests/simple.go`, 10, `assert.OK(t, 1 == 1, "1 is 1")`, 0, translatedassert.NewPosValuePair(16, 1 == 1))
	}()
}
